# SKALE Deployer

This is a contract that acts similar to the create2 deployer that hardhat-deploy uses, but emits useful events (which is great for a gas-free chain).

You can drop this into hardhat-deploy using the deterministicDeploy config in your hardhat.config.ts:

```
{
  deterministicDeployment: (network: string) => {
    return {
      factory: '<factory_address>',
      deployer: '<deployer_address>',
      funding: '<required_funding_in_wei>',
      signedTx: '<raw_signed_tx>',
    };
  };
}
```

signer:  0x3986D37De6b3fF2cF492D1E6CA4A05cB1cd1768E
signed:  {
  data: ''
}
